https://world.openproductsfacts.org/terms-of-use
Open Products Facts is an open database of more than %1$s products (plus the ones you will contribute).
Open Products Facts is an open database of food products with ingredients, allergens, nutrition facts and all the tidbits of information we can find on product labels.
Prispevajte k preglednosti izdelkov
Scan products, take them in picture, make food transparency happen
Pridobi dejstva
Obširne informacije o izdelkih, ki ste jih optično prebrali, so razložene za vas
Spremljajte izdelek, ki ga uporabljate
Vse izdelke, ki ste jih skenirali, lahko izvozite na enem priročnem seznamu
Deluje brez povezave
Dodate lahko nove izdelke, tudi če trenutno nimate internetne povezave
The product you scanned does not exist yet in Open Products Facts. Please add it.
The product you scanned does already exist in Open Products Facts.
Look at this product on Open Products Facts :
Books are not currently supported by Open Products Facts
- broadening your search \n- scan and add it to Open Products Facts
Kliknite tukaj za darovanje, Open Products Facts
Pomagajte prevesti Open Products Facts
Dodajte Open Facts Facts zbirko podatkov v vaš jezik - tehnično znanje ni potrebno
Skenirajte izdelke tudi, ko ste brez povezave, da jih boste kasneje dodali v Open Products Facts. Skenirani izdelki bodo prikazani tukaj in jih boste lahko poslali z uporabo spodnjega gumba.

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Open Products Facts server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!

the free product database

Add more details to help complete the product
Add a category to help complete the product
Add a category and more details to help complete the product
Products I have
Izdelki za nakup
Add to Open Products Facts

You\'ll be able to add product to this list by scanning products, dragging the product card up and tapping on \"Products to buy\". You\'ll also be able to add products to this list by searching them and clicking on the + button in the top right of the product page.
Open Products Facts logo
